message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a great deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $13000. It's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $12500. This is the best price I can offer, considering the value of the product to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
